body:
I wanted to make an AMA to talk to some of the community and have a nice discussion too.
So fire away.
:)
body_tagged:
I wanted to make an AMA to talk to some of the community and have a nice discussion too.
So fire away.
:)
title: Snow's 1st AMA.

replies.body: How did you come up with your username?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your username?

replies.body:
When I got my Minecraft account I wanted to create a name based off of my favourite games.

-The SSX series is my favourite hands-down.
That's the "SX"
-I spent countless hours playig Midtown Madness 3 when I was younger, so there's the "3".
-And Snow is just a name I thought of, it seems to work quite well.

So there you go!
replies.body_tagged:

So there you go!

replies.body: How I met your mother or The Big Bang Theory?
replies.body_tagged: How I met your mother or The Big Bang Theory?

replies.body:
How I met your mother hands down.
Such a brilliant show, very funny and extremely well written.
